text:
TaskRabbit - http://taskrabbit.com/ Senior Ruby & JS Engineers - San Francisco - Onsite - Full Time - Citizen (Visa Transfers Available)

TaskRabbit’s looking to hire full time engineers to help us revolutionize how work gets done. We were founded back in 2008 and are one of the pioneers of the On Demand Economy. Since then, we've been building a peer-to-peer marketplace that safely and reliably connects neighbors to get things done.

We’re looking for experienced engineers & devops folks comfortable working on the server in Ruby or on the Client in JavaScript. We believe strongly in modern development practices like code reviews, thorough unit testing, and smart collaboration. Read more at https://www.taskrabbit.com/careers. You can also get to know us better as a team at our tech blog: http://tech.taskrabbit.com/.
